room_title: Escape room "Dead Man's Hand" by Lake Escape in Lake Ozark
room_address: 1384 Bagnell Dam Blvd Lake Ozark, MO 65049
room_description: Your grandfather was a wealthy man, widely known around the world for his detective work busting gangs and their notorious leaders. Unfortunately, your grandfather has passed at the hand of the most infamous gang leader, and has left his estate in your hands. Now, a rumor has risen that your grandfather never could catch the gang leader because he himself was the leader. In a race against the clock, you have one hour to decipher the secrets inside your grandfather's estate to try and clear his name.​​
